short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension draw charts from data tables.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to get a chart in one click from any data table on the internet.
You just need to select the table, and click on the extension button!
